website_summaries.verdict: LEGO is the perfect place for crafting awesome elements from the Avengers series, especially this highly articulated, large, and all-around cool War Buster armor.
pros: Includes Ant-Man, War Machine, and 2 Outrider minifigures
cons: Sadly, the War Buster armor wasn’t in any Avengers movies... yet

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is Autistic, but he is a master at Legos. We’ve just recently discovered this gift. So, as money allows, I will smother him in Lego gifts. I am so excited that we found something he can do! It is truly amazing that my career cognitive delayed boy can master something! He has found something he is truly amazing at. This Lego War Machine offered him zero challenge, but I’m sure it would be a challenge to you to I. It is so well built, and now he plays with it since he put it together. Thanks Lego for giving my sweet boy someone he can be amazing at!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Yay, Legos!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love? These are Legos! They can be used to make the pictured design, or you can use the parts in any way you please. One of the things I really love about Legos is that they keep coming up with new ways to put them together to make characters and vehicles and lots of other cools stuff from every popular movie universe. These are toys for every generation and level of construction ability.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dexter Moses

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old bought this with his own money and loves it! It only took him about an hour to put it together, which is great for him, because he was ready to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: LizBeth

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grandson for his birthday. It was a hit. Parent is needed to help with putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: bbizal

customer_reviews.title: The box was broken!! Can’t give this as a gift now very upset
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 legos for gifts, one of them this one the avengers cake with a broken box. Now I have to run to the store to buy another gift. Totally unacceptable as I’m buying this product NEW and expect it to be in perfect condition to the box to the actually item.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen L. Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Easy build for experienced LEGO builders
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my son and he love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool, but it’s not in the movie! What gives??
customer_reviews.author: KennedyX8

customer_reviews.title: Lego box received dented
customer_reviews.text: This was intended to be a gift for my grandson. Amazon shipped it in a padded envelope which was insufficient. The Lego box was dented. Amazon has always shipped these Legos in an outer box. I would otherwise given this 5 stars, 2 stars off for the dented box.
customer_reviews.author: lmks

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery time, perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I juts received my order in the mail today; I am quite pleased with the quality appearance. It arrived on-time in perfection condition. That's saying a lot these days. I plan to gift this to my little nephew, and I hope he'll love it. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: A. Troutman

customer_reviews.title: Good value and fun for collection
customer_reviews.text: Product was a good value for the build difficulty and amount of pieces. Great collector item or just for fun. Great for kids as well as adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a gift for our grandson (9 yrs old) and he loved it! He is a huge Lego fan and this one kept him busy for a couple of hours. I love buying our grandkids gifts that make them use their brain! Less expensive than at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble with an entertaining end result
customer_reviews.text: I’m a relatively new LEGO enthusiast but this is my favorite little set I’ve constructed yet. Comprehensive instructions and a fun end product. I did superglue part of the non-moving body mass because my son found it that parts of it easily fell apart. Regardless, my 5 year old and I both recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sabath

customer_reviews.title: Nice minifigs-great price
customer_reviews.text: Value is great! Characters are extremely rare-only set with war machine (who has a Rhodes head and a Rhodes face with the screen from the helmet-and the only set with big ant man .
customer_reviews.author: GardenZen

customer_reviews.title: Lego Avengers  kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for grandson's 7th birthday. He had a little help from his 8 yr old brother (with guidance from Dad) but managed to put together in a short period of time. He has put it on the shelf for now to admire it before it gets smashed by the other siblings. Age guidelines were appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was sent to entertain grandson because I couldn't visit this summer. I know it was easy for him to put together, but as a grandma, I don't find them so easy to assemble. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing for marvel fans and if you follow carefully the instruction easy to assemble. Definitely not recommended for kids under 4 years it has quite tiny pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Stefany AB

customer_reviews.title: Great for pre teen
customer_reviews.text: This is a good price for your pre teen years gift. She said it was perfect. Not hard to put together but it made her pay attention to what she was doing
customer_reviews.author: laura fowler

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect from Lego
customer_reviews.text: This lego set is exactly what we expected and my son loved it. He was able to assemble it by himself and fairly quickly. He was so excited and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ilove2giggle95

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Though I love putting my hands on a product before I buy it, I am pleased with this order. It was exactly what my child wanted. The package arrived well and contained all its pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Tania T

customer_reviews.title: awsome set

customer_reviews.title: Captures the War-Machine character nicely!
customer_reviews.text: My kids adore it. In true War-machine fashion it is loaded to the teeth with (functional) armaments. This and the seperate "hulk buster" armor set, also from Lego, are fantastically detailed packs and hours of fun!

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!

Besides, Lego is also a famous brand, and its quality is very trustworthy. It's a good choice for children's toys.

product_meta.title: LEGO Marvel Avengers War Machine Buster 76124 Building Kit (362 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Size:362Storm into battle against the Outriders and save Ant-Man with the LEGO Marvel Avengers 76124 War Machine Buster. This awesome posable Marvel toy mech features an opening minifigure cockpit, 6-stud rapid shooter, 2 detachable stud-shooting cannons, 2 flick missiles, gripping hands and an opening storage compartment for extra ammo. This cool children’s construction toy has 4 minifigures—including War Machine and Ant-Man, both with new-for-March-2019 Avengers team suit decoration—to recreate thrilling scenes from the Marvel Avengers movies.
feature_bullets: Build the posable War Machine Buster mech toy, with an opening minifigure cockpit, 6-stud rapid shooter, 2 detachable stud-shooting cannons, 2 flick missiles and gripping hands, and battle the Outriders!
Includes 4 minifigures: a War Machine figure and Ant-Man, each featuring new-for-March-2019 Avengers team suit decoration, plus 2 Outriders
War Machine Buster mech model measures over 6-inch (17cm) high, 2-inch (6cm) long and 5-inch (14cm) wide
Recreate exciting action from the Marvel Avengers movies with this fun-packed creative building toy

362 pieces – Marvel superhero toy construction kit for boys and girls aged 7+ and for fans and kids of all ages This LEGO Marvel Avengers War Machine Buster 76124 building set for kids can be built together with all other original LEGO playsets and LEGO bricks for imaginative play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,645 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
